00041 typedef enum
00042 {
00043     JR_NEITHER = 0,
00044     JR_EMAIL_ONLY,
00045     JR_SMS_ONLY,
00046     JR_EMAIL_AND_SMS
00047 } EmailOrSms;
00048 #define JR_EMAIL 1
00049 #define JR_SMS 2
00050 
00051 #define JRR_OUTER_STROKE_COLOR    [UIColor colorWithRed:0.8 green:0.8 blue:0.8 alpha:1.0]
00052 #define JRR_INNER_STROKE_COLOR    JANRAIN_BLUE
00053 #define JRR_OUTER_FILL_COLOR      [UIColor colorWithRed:0.8 green:0.8 blue:0.8 alpha:1.0]
00054 #define JRR_INNER_FILL_COLOR      [UIColor clearColor]
00055 #define JRR_OUTER_STROKE_WIDTH    0.1
00056 #define JRR_INNER_STROKE_WIDTH    0.5
00057 #define JRR_OUTER_CORNER_RADIUS   10.0
00058 #define JRR_INNER_CORNER_RADIUS   9.0
00059 #define JRR_INNER_RECT_INSET      6
00060 
00061 @interface JRRoundedRect : UIView
00062 {
00063     UIColor *outerStrokeColor;
00064     UIColor *innerStrokeColor;
00065     UIColor *outerFillColor;
00066     UIColor *innerFillColor;
00067     CGFloat  outerStrokeWidth;
00068     CGFloat  innerStrokeWidth;
00069     CGFloat  outerCornerRadius;
00070     CGFloat  innerCornerRadius;
00071     BOOL     drawInnerRect;
00072 }
00073 @property (nonatomic, retain) UIColor *outerStrokeColor;
00074 @property (nonatomic, retain) UIColor *innerStrokeColor;
00075 @property (nonatomic, retain) UIColor *outerFillColor;
00076 @property (nonatomic, retain) UIColor *innerFillColor;
00077 @property CGFloat outerStrokeWidth;
00078 @property CGFloat innerStrokeWidth;
00079 @property CGFloat outerCornerRadius;
00080 @property CGFloat innerCornerRadius;
00081 @property BOOL    drawInnerRect;
00082 @end
